title: Weatherbit.io - Swagger UI Weather API documentation
description: This is the documentation for the Weatherbit Weather API.  The base URL for the API is [http://api.weatherbit.io/v2.0/](http://api.weatherbit.io/v2.0/) or [https://api.weatherbit.io/v2.0/](http://api.weatherbit.io/v2.0/). Below is the Swagger UI documentation for the API. All API requests require the `key` parameter.        An Example for a 5 day forecast for London, UK would be `http://api.weatherbit.io/v2.0/forecast/3hourly?city=London`&`country=UK`. See our [Weather API description page](https://www.weatherbit.io/api) for additional documentation.

get_alerts_lat__lat__lon__lon_.title: Returns severe weather alerts issued by meteorological agencies - Given a lat/lon.
get_alerts_lat__lat__lon__lon_.description: Returns severe weather alerts issued by meteorological agencies - given a lat, and a lon.

get_bulk_files__file_.title: Download pre-generated bulk datasets
get_bulk_files__file_.description: **(Advanceed/Enterprise plans only)** Downloads bulk data files - OPTIONS: ( current.json.gz - Current observations for cities > 1000 population). Units are Metric (Celcius, m/s, etc).

get_bulk_history_daily_city__city__count.title: [Enterprise Plan Only] Returns Historical Observations - Given City and/or State, Country.
get_bulk_history_daily_city__city__count.description: Returns Historical Observations - Given a city in the format of City,ST or City. The state, and country parameters can be provided to make the search more accurate.

get_bulk_history_daily_city_id__city_id_.title: [Enterprise Plan Only] Returns Historical Observations - Given a City ID
get_bulk_history_daily_city_id__city_id_.description: Returns Historical Observations - Given a City ID.

get_bulk_history_daily_ip__ip_.title: [Enterprise Plan Only] Returns Historical Observations - Given IP Address, or auto.
get_bulk_history_daily_ip__ip_.description: Returns Historical Observations - Given IP Address, or auto.

get_bulk_history_daily_lat__lat__lon__lo.title: [Enterprise Plan Only] Returns Historical Observations - Given a lat/lon.
get_bulk_history_daily_lat__lat__lon__lo.description: Returns Historical Observations - Given a lat, and lon.

get_bulk_history_daily_postal_code__post.title: [Enterprise Plan Only] Returns Historical Observations - Given a Postal Code
get_bulk_history_daily_postal_code__post.description: Returns Historical Observations - Given a Postal Code.

get_bulk_history_daily_station__station_.title: [Enterprise Plan Only] Returns Historical Observations - Given a station ID.
get_bulk_history_daily_station__station_.description: Returns Historical Observations - Given a station ID.

get_bulk_history_hourly_city__city__coun.title: [Enterprise Plan Only] Returns Historical Observations - Given City and/or State, Country. (1 Year/call limit)
get_bulk_history_hourly_city__city__coun.description: Returns Historical Observations - Given a city in the format of City,ST or City. The state, and country parameters can be provided to make the search more accurate.

get_bulk_history_hourly_city_id__city_id.title: [Enterprise Plan Only] Returns Historical Observations - Given a City ID. (1 Year/call limit)
get_bulk_history_hourly_city_id__city_id.description: Returns Historical Observations - Given a City ID.

get_bulk_history_hourly_ip__ip_.title: [Enterprise Plan Only] Returns Historical Observations - Given IP Address, or auto. (1 Year/call limit)
get_bulk_history_hourly_ip__ip_.description: Returns Historical Observations - Given IP Address, or auto.

get_bulk_history_hourly_lat__lat__lon__l.title: [Enterprise Plan Only] Returns Historical Observations - Given a lat/lon. (1 Year/call limit)
get_bulk_history_hourly_lat__lat__lon__l.description: Returns Historical Observations - Given a lat, and lon.

get_bulk_history_hourly_postal_code__pos.title: [Enterprise Plan Only] Returns Historical Observations - Given a Postal Code. (1 Year/call limit)
get_bulk_history_hourly_postal_code__pos.description: Returns Historical Observations - Given a Postal Code.

get_bulk_history_hourly_station__station.description: Returns Historical Observations - Given a station ID.

get_current_cities__cities_.title: Returns a group of observations given a list of cities
get_current_cities__cities_.description: Returns a group of Current Observations - Given a list of City IDs.

get_current_city__city__country__country.title: Returns a Current Observation - Given City and/or State, Country.
get_current_city__city__country__country.description: Returns a Current Observation - Given a city in the format of City,ST or City. The state, and country parameters can be provided to make the search more accurate.

get_current_city_id__city_id_.title: Returns a current observation by city id.
get_current_city_id__city_id_.description: Returns current weather observation - Given a City ID.

get_current_ip__ip_.title: Returns a Current Observation - Given an IP address, or auto.
get_current_ip__ip_.description: Returns a Current Observation - Given an IP address, or auto.

get_current_lat__lat__lon__lon_.title: Returns a Current Observation - Given a lat/lon.
get_current_lat__lat__lon__lon_.description: Returns a Current Observation - given a lat, and a lon.

get_current_postal_code__postal_code_.title: Returns a current observation by postal code.
get_current_postal_code__postal_code_.description: Returns current weather observation - Given a Postal Code.

get_current_station__station_.title: Returns a Current Observation. - Given a station ID.
get_current_station__station_.description: Returns a Current Observation - Given a station ID.

get_current_stations__stations_.title: Returns a group of observations given a list of stations
get_current_stations__stations_.description: Returns a group of Current Observations - Given a list of Station Call IDs.

get_forecast_3hourly_city__city__country.title: Returns a 3-hourly forecast - Given City and/or State, Country.
get_forecast_3hourly_city__city__country.description: Returns a 3-hourly forecast, where each point represents a three hour   period. Every point has a datetime string in the format "YYYY-MM-DD:HH". Time is UTC.

get_forecast_3hourly_city_id__city_id_.title: Returns a 3-hourly forecast - Given a City ID.
get_forecast_3hourly_city_id__city_id_.description: Returns a 3-hourly forecast, where each point represents a three hour   period. Every point has a datetime string in the format "YYYY-MM-DD:HH". Time is UTC.

get_forecast_3hourly_ip__ip_.title: Returns a 3hourly forecast - Given an IP Address, or ip=auto for automatic IP lookup.
get_forecast_3hourly_ip__ip_.description: Returns a 3-hourly forecast, where each point represents a three hour   period. Every point has a datetime string in the format "YYYY-MM-DD:HH". Time is UTC.

get_forecast_3hourly_lat__lat__lon__lon_.title: Returns a 3-hourly forecast - Given a lat/lon.
get_forecast_3hourly_lat__lat__lon__lon_.description: Returns a 3-hourly forecast, where each point represents a three hour   period. Every point has a datetime string in the format "YYYY-MM-DD:HH". Time is UTC.

get_forecast_3hourly_postal_code__postal.title: Returns a 3-hourly forecast - Given a Postal Code.
get_forecast_3hourly_postal_code__postal.description: Returns a 3-hourly forecast, where each point represents a three hour period. Every point has a datetime string in the format "YYYY-MM-DD:HH". Time is UTC.

get_forecast_daily_city__city__country__.title: Returns a daily forecast - Given City and/or State, Country.
get_forecast_daily_city__city__country__.description: Returns a daily forecast, where each point represents one day (24hr) period. Every point has a datetime string in the format "YYYY-MM-DD". One day begins at 00:00 UTC, and ends at 23:59 UTC. Accepts a city in the format of City,ST or City. The state, and country parameters can be provided to make the search more accurate.

get_forecast_daily_city_id__city_id_.title: Returns a daily forecast - Given a City ID.
get_forecast_daily_city_id__city_id_.description: Returns a daily forecast, where each point represents one day (24hr) period. Every point has a datetime string in the format "YYYY-MM-DD". One day begins at 00:00 UTC, and ends at 23:59 UTC.

get_forecast_daily_ip__ip_.title: Returns a daily forecast - Given an IP Address, or ip=auto for automatic IP lookup.
get_forecast_daily_ip__ip_.description: Returns a daily forecast, where each point represents one day (24hr) period. Every point has a datetime string in the format "YYYY-MM-DD". One day begins at 00:00 UTC, and ends at 23:59 UTC.

get_forecast_daily_lat__lat__lon__lon_.title: Returns a daily forecast - Given Lat/Lon.
get_forecast_daily_lat__lat__lon__lon_.description: Returns a daily forecast, where each point represents one day (24hr) period. Every point has a datetime string in the format "YYYY-MM-DD". One day begins at 00:00 UTC, and ends at 23:59 UTC.

get_forecast_daily_postal_code__postal_c.title: Returns a daily forecast - Given a Postal Code.
get_forecast_daily_postal_code__postal_c.description: Returns a daily forecast, where each point represents one day (24hr) period. Every point has a datetime string in the format "YYYY-MM-DD". One day begins at 00:00 UTC, and ends at 23:59 UTC.

get_forecast_energy_lat__lat__lon__lon_.title: Returns Energy Forecast API response  - Given a single lat/lon.
get_forecast_energy_lat__lat__lon__lon_.description: Retrieve an 8 day forecast relevant to te Energy Sector (degree days, solar radiation, precipitation, wind).

get_forecast_hourly_city__city__country_.title: Returns an 48 hour (hourly forecast) - Given City and/or State, Country.
get_forecast_hourly_city__city__country_.description: Returns an hourly forecast, where each point represents a one hour   period. Every point has a datetime string in the format "YYYY-MM-DD:HH". Time is UTC. Accepts a city in the format of City,ST or City. The state, and country parameters can be provided to make the search more accurate.

get_forecast_hourly_city_id__city_id_.title: Returns a 48 hour (hourly) forecast - Given a City ID.
get_forecast_hourly_city_id__city_id_.description: Returns an hourly forecast, where each point represents a one hour   period. Every point has a datetime string in the format "YYYY-MM-DD:HH". Time is UTC.

get_forecast_hourly_ip__ip_.title: Returns a hourly forecast - Given an IP Address, or ip=auto for automatic IP lookup.
get_forecast_hourly_ip__ip_.description: Returns an hourly forecast, where each point represents a one hour period. Every point has a datetime string in the format "YYYY-MM-DD:HH". Time is UTC.

get_forecast_hourly_lat__lat__lon__lon_.title: Returns 48 hour (hourly) forecast - Given a lat/lon.
get_forecast_hourly_lat__lat__lon__lon_.description: Returns an hourly forecast, where each point represents a one hour period. Every point has a datetime string in the format "YYYY-MM-DD:HH". Time is UTC.

get_forecast_hourly_postal_code__postal_.title: Returns a 48 hour (hourly) forecast - Given a Postal Code.
get_forecast_hourly_postal_code__postal_.description: Returns an hourly forecast, where each point represents a one hour   period. Every point has a datetime string in the format "YYYY-MM-DD:HH". Time is UTC.

get_history_daily_city__city__country__c.title: Returns Historical Observations - Given City and/or State, Country.
get_history_daily_city__city__country__c.description: Returns Historical Observations - Given a city in the format of City,ST or City. The state, and country parameters can be provided to make the search more accurate. **(LIMIT 1 day for Free plan. LIMIT 7 days for Developer. LIMIT 30 days for Advanced/Advanced+/Enterprise)**

get_history_daily_city_id__city_id_.description: Returns Historical Observations - Given a City ID. **(LIMIT 1 day for Free plan. LIMIT 7 days for Developer. LIMIT 30 days for Advanced/Advanced+/Enterprise)**

get_history_daily_lat__lat__lon__lon_.description: Returns Historical Observations - Given a lat, and lon. **(LIMIT 1 day for Free plan. LIMIT 7 days for Developer. LIMIT 30 days for Advanced/Advanced+/Enterprise)**

get_history_energy_bbox_lat1__lat1__lon1.title: Returns multiple locations given a bounding box.
get_history_energy_bbox_lat1__lat1__lon1.description: Returns aggregate energy specific historical weather fields, over a specified time period. Supply a bounding box ex: lat1=40&lon1=-78&lat2=38&lon2=-80. This API will return UP TO 150 stations, aggregated by the specified time period start_date to end_date.

get_history_energy_lat__lat__lon__lon_.title: Returns Energy API response  - Given a single lat/lon.
get_history_energy_lat__lat__lon__lon_.description: Returns aggregate energy specific historical weather fields, over a specified time period.

get_history_hourly_lat__lat__lon__lon_.description: Returns Historical Observations - Given a lat, and lon. **(LIMIT 1 day for Free plan. LIMIT 7 days for Developer. LIMIT 30 days for Advanced/Advanced+/Enterprise)**

get_ip_ip__ip_.title: Returns an Geolocation object.
get_ip_ip__ip_.description: Returns a geolocation object. Given an IP address. If no IP supplied, will use request IP address.
